summary: We testified about the Postal Service's efforts to transition its fleet to electric vehicles and federal fleet transition issues. USPS recently ordered about 40,000 gas and 10,000 electric vehicles. Our preliminary review raises questions about certain assumptions in USPS's cost and benefit estimates. For example, it Used a gas price about $2 per gallon less than the current national average Assumed maintenance would cost more...
title: Fleet Management: Preliminary Observations on Electric Vehicles in the Postal and Federal Fleets
